meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Mike Hatch Betsy Schroeder Brandon Libby Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6291.

td.p: Mike Hatch, a men's clothing sales associate from Gainesville, Georgia
Betsy Schroeder, a graduate student of veterinary medicine from Blacksburg, Virginia
Brandon Libby, an actor and Phillie Phanstormer from Mount Ephraim, New Jersey (whose 2-day cash winnings total $31,600)

tr.td: DR. MASSEUSE RHYMES
TAKE IT "SLOW"
GOLD
AT WIDE RECEIVER FOR THIS TEAM...
PUNCH
JUDEA
